messages.message: if you’re not running celery-app-tasks via ppy, then yes none of your requests will get routed to your model-service that you’re running via ppy

you should run every service via ppy - for example, you’ll definitely need to run `job-service` via ppy so that it will initialize the model store in `model-service` correctly, but the db used by `job-service` should be the same as the db as the other go services
